name: NSPropertyMapping
desc: A mapping instance that specifies in a model how to map from a property in a source entity to a property in a destination entity.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: The name of the property in the destination entity for the property mapping.

items.name: var valueExpression: NSExpression?
items.desc: The value expression for the property mapping.

items.name: var userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: The user info for the property mapping.
